column1: #Text=Foreigners have no right to purchase whatever they want in Canada.
#Text=Anyone who is not a permanent resident by definition should not need to purchase a home.
#Text=This is all about storing wealth and making money flipping homes.
#Text=The BC Government has now stopped a big business that foreigners were making in BC and the foreigners do not like losing this business.
#Text=Homes are not to be treated like blocks of gold to be stuffed in the deposit boxes of foreigners.
#Text=They are needed for people to live in.
